New songs

...are on the way. I was just in the studio again at New Monkey (which is where I recorded Arms Around the River) and we took a good crack at laying down the basic tracks. I think this album is going to blow everything else out of the water. Of course, I say that every time I make an album. Anyway, check out Les Yeux Gris for a little taste. See you in the Spring!

By Krister Axel on 11/10 2007 at 01_28 in Historical
